verses.plain: Behold, the LORD’s hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear:

tokens.t: Behold, the
hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear:

verses.plain: But your iniquities have separated between you and your God, and your sins have hid his face from you, that he will not hear.

tokens.t: But your iniquities have separated between you and your God, and your sins have hid
face from you, that he will not hear.

verses.plain: For your hands are defiled with blood, and your fingers with iniquity; your lips have spoken lies, your tongue hath muttered perverseness.

tokens.t: For your hands are defiled with blood, and your fingers with iniquity; your lips have spoken lies, your tongue hath muttered perverseness.

verses.plain: None calleth for justice, nor any pleadeth for truth: they trust in vanity, and speak lies; they conceive mischief, and bring forth iniquity.

tokens.t: None calleth for justice, nor
pleadeth for truth: they trust in vanity, and speak lies; they conceive mischief, and bring forth iniquity.

verses.plain: They hatch cockatrice’ eggs, and weave the spider’s web: he that eateth of their eggs dieth, and that which is crushed breaketh out into a viper.

tokens.t: They hatch cockatrice’ eggs, and weave the spider’s web: he that eateth of their eggs dieth, and that which is crushed breaketh out into a viper.

verses.plain: Their webs shall not become garments, neither shall they cover themselves with their works: their works are works of iniquity, and the act of violence is in their hands.

tokens.t: Their webs shall not become garments, neither shall they cover themselves with their works: their works
works of iniquity, and the act of violence
in their hands.

verses.plain: Their feet run to evil, and they make haste to shed innocent blood: their thoughts are thoughts of iniquity; wasting and destruction are in their paths.

tokens.t: Their feet run to evil, and they make haste to shed innocent blood: their thoughts
thoughts of iniquity; wasting and destruction
in their paths.

verses.plain: The way of peace they know not; and there is no judgment in their goings: they have made them crooked paths: whosoever goeth therein shall not know peace.

tokens.t: The way of peace they know not; and
no judgment in their goings: they have made them crooked paths: whosoever goeth therein shall not know peace.

verses.plain: ¶ Therefore is judgment far from us, neither doth justice overtake us: we wait for light, but behold obscurity; for brightness, but we walk in darkness.

tokens.t: ¶ Therefore is judgment far from us, neither doth justice overtake us: we wait for light, but behold obscurity; for brightness,
we walk in darkness.

verses.plain: We grope for the wall like the blind, and we grope as if we had no eyes: we stumble at noonday as in the night; we are in desolate places as dead men.

tokens.t: We grope for the wall like the blind, and we grope as if
no eyes: we stumble at noonday as in the night;
in desolate places as dead

verses.plain: We roar all like bears, and mourn sore like doves: we look for judgment, but there is none; for salvation, but it is far off from us.

tokens.t: We roar all like bears, and mourn sore like doves: we look for judgment, but
none; for salvation,
it is far off from us.

verses.plain: For our transgressions are multiplied before thee, and our sins testify against us: for our transgressions are with us; and as for our iniquities, we know them;

tokens.t: For our transgressions are multiplied before thee, and our sins testify against us: for our transgressions
with us; and
our iniquities, we know them;

verses.plain: In transgressing and lying against the LORD, and departing away from our God, speaking oppression and revolt, conceiving and uttering from the heart words of falsehood.

tokens.t: In transgressing and lying against the
, and departing away from our God, speaking oppression and revolt, conceiving and uttering from the heart words of falsehood.

verses.plain: And judgment is turned away backward, and justice standeth afar off: for truth is fallen in the street, and equity cannot enter.

tokens.t: And judgment is turned away backward, and justice standeth afar off: for truth is fallen in the street, and equity cannot enter.

verses.plain: Yea, truth faileth; and he that departeth from evil maketh himself a prey: and the LORD saw it, and it displeased him that there was no judgment.

tokens.t: Yea, truth faileth; and he
departeth from evil maketh himself a prey: and the
saw
, and it displeased him that
no judgment.

verses.plain: ¶ And he saw that there was no man, and wondered that there was no intercessor: therefore his arm brought salvation unto him; and his righteousness, it sustained him.

tokens.t: ¶ And he saw that
no man, and wondered that
no intercessor: therefore his arm brought salvation unto him; and his righteousness, it sustained him.

verses.plain: For he put on righteousness as a breastplate, and an helmet of salvation upon his head; and he put on the garments of vengeance for clothing, and was clad with zeal as a cloke.

tokens.t: For he put on righteousness as a breastplate, and an helmet of salvation upon his head; and he put on the garments of vengeance
clothing, and was clad with zeal as a cloke.

verses.plain: According to their deeds, accordingly he will repay, fury to his adversaries, recompence to his enemies; to the islands he will repay recompence.

tokens.t: According to
deeds, accordingly he will repay, fury to his adversaries, recompence to his enemies; to the islands he will repay recompence.

verses.plain: So shall they fear the name of the LORD from the west, and his glory from the rising of the sun. When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the LORD shall lift up a standard against him.

tokens.t: So shall they fear the name of the
from the west, and his glory from the rising of the sun. When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the
shall lift up a standard against him.

verses.plain: ¶ And the Redeemer shall come to Zion, and unto them that turn from transgression in Jacob, saith the LORD.

tokens.t: ¶ And the Redeemer shall come to Zion, and unto them that turn from transgression in Jacob, saith the

verses.plain: As for me, this is my covenant with them, saith the LORD; My spirit that is upon thee, and my words which I have put in thy mouth, shall not depart out of thy mouth, nor out of the mouth of thy seed, nor out of the mouth of thy seed’s seed, saith the LORD, from henceforth and for ever.

tokens.t: As for me, this
my covenant with them, saith the
; My spirit that
upon thee, and my words which I have put in thy mouth, shall not depart out of thy mouth, nor out of the mouth of thy seed, nor out of the mouth of thy seed’s seed, saith the
, from henceforth and for ever.

footnotes.text: have hid: or, have made him hide
crushed…: or, sprinkled is as if there brake out a viper
it displeased…: Heb. it was evil in his eyes
lift…: or, put him to flight
